Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Board
Direct Known Subclasses:
IslandBoard
public abstract class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Class to abstractly model the Board
Author:
giorgio

    • getCellAt

      public abstract Cell getCellAt​(int x, int y) throws OutOfBoardException
      Method that returns the Cell at the passed position.
      Parameters:
      x - (the x coordinate of the searched Cell)
      y - (the y coordinate of the searched Cell)
      Returns:
      (the searched Cell)
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - (if the searched Cell is out of board Bounds)

    • getXDim

      Method that returns the x dimension of the board

    • getAdjacentCells

      public java.util.List<Cell> getAdjacentCells​(Cell cell)
      Method that returns the adjacent Cell to the one given.
      Parameters:
      cell - (Cell to check the adjacent)
      Returns:
      (list of all the adjacent Cells)

    • removeWorkers

      public void removeWorkers​(Player player)
      Method that removes all the workers relative to the given player from the Board.
      Parameters:
      player - (the Player which Workers have to be removed).
